message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. However, $180 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only offer $120 at this time.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $165?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $165 is still a bit steep for me. I'm really keen on this product, but I can't go any higher than $140. Let me know what you think.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product, so I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $155?

Alice, I understand your need to make a profit, but $155 is still a bit out of my price range. If you're willing to come down to $145, I'm happy to close the deal right now. Otherwise, I'm going to have to explore other options.

I'm not willing to go below $155, Bob. However, I'm willing to sweeten the deal for you. If you're willing to commit to the purchase today, I'll throw in a free accessory that's worth $20. So, the total price would be $155 for the product and $20 for the accessory, making it a total of $175. What do you think?
